messages.subject: Re: how have unschoolers fared after growing up?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/6/03 6:33:38 AM Central Standard Time, ... Aren t there unschooling kids who have used narrative transcripts to get directly into
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/6/03 6:33:38 AM Central Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:


> They apply for some beginnig kind of college class at a junior college or
> community college and see if they like it, sometimes. After they take a few
> classes, they can say "some college" on applications, and if they did okay
> on those
> clases, they can use that when they apply to college full time.
>
> Sandra
>
>

Aren't there unschooling kids who have used narrative transcripts to get
directly into universities?

Laura B.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
